fr.upmc.datacenterclient.requestgenerator.ports

Class RequestGeneratorManagementOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractPort
      • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
        • fr.upmc.datacenterclient.requestgenerator.ports.RequestGeneratorManagementOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI, RequestGeneratorManagementI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RequestGeneratorManagementOutboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements RequestGeneratorManagementI
    The class RequestGeneratorManagementOutboundPort implements the outbound port through which one calls the component management methods.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : May 5, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
